episodes.title: Private Investigator Reveals the Darkest Cults He Infiltrated Over 10 Years
episodes.description:
Ever wondered what it's really like to go undercover in a cult? Join us on Story Cube as we chat with Benoît Jude, a private detective who infiltrates secretive spiritual groups. Hear wild true stories, psychological insights, and behind-the-scenes moments from a decade of daring investigations! Hit subscribe, drop a comment about your favorite part, and join the Story Cube community! #podcast #detective #cult #truecrime #investigation

👉 This channel was created in collaboration with @noa_dorian

00:00:04 - Introduction to Benoit Jude and Cult Infiltration
00:01:21 - Types of Cults and Victims
00:04:56 - Detective Work: Disappearances and Cases
00:10:04 - Covid's Impact and Manipulation Mechanisms
00:14:58 - Investigation Tactics and Social Media Influence
00:17:05 - Notorious Cases: Order of the Solar Temple
00:20:55 - Personal Infiltration Stories and Child Safety
00:26:27 - Rituals, Mind Control, and Documentary Launch
